rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Foyer
rooms.description: A spacious foyer that sets the tone for the bungalow's brutalist design. The space features raw concrete finishes with exposed structural elements, aligning with Vastu principles by ensuring a clear front entrance.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: An expansive living area featuring floor-to-ceiling windows that provide abundant natural light. The design includes raw concrete walls and an exposed steel frame to emphasize the brutalist aesthetic.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: A modern dining space with a minimalist approach. It incorporates industrial materials and large windows for ample daylight while respecting Vastu by ensuring an unobstructed view of the entrance.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A functional kitchen with efficient storage. The design uses robust materials and open shelving to complement the brutalist style while ensuring proper ventilation in line with local norms.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: An integrated library space featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for ample natural light. The area is designed as a retreat within the home, blending raw materials with comfortable seating.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A cozy guest bedroom that includes built-in storage and access to natural light. The design adheres to Vastu principles by placing the room in a location promoting harmony.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A dedicated private gym located on the ground floor. It features open space with robust flooring and large windows for natural light, ensuring a functional workout environment.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: A bold entrance door that complements the brutalist design and ensures proper Vastu alignment.

openings.name: Window Opening - Living Room
openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows in the living room to maximize natural light and ventilation.

openings.name: Window Opening - Library
openings.description: Large window openings to enhance the library's ambiance with plenty of daylight while adhering to local building norms.

openings.name: Window Opening - Private Gym
openings.description: Strategically placed windows in the gym area to ensure ventilation and natural lighting.
